titleInfo.title: Virtual reality test of visual performance: Processing speed and working memory

mods.abstract: This DOI contains the C++ code of our TVA-based (theory of visual attention, Bundesen, 1990) whole report assessment implemented on the virtual reality device Oculus Rift. The assessment meassures three components of visual processing capabilities: The visual processing speed, the threshold of conscious perception, and the capacity of visual working memory (for more information see Foerster, Poth, Behler, Botsch, & Schneider, 2016)
